New Records: Abdullah Shafique became the first Pakistani batter to score a century on World Cup debut
Key Match Events: Mohammad Rizwan (131 n.o.) guided Pakistan to its second win in two games with a spirited performance despite battling repeated cramps
Kusal Mendis (122) and Sadeera Samarawickrama (108) scored brilliant centuries for Sri Lanka, but it went in vain
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan recorded the highest successful chase in the history of the quadrennial event
Hasan's four-wicket haul brought Babar's men back into the game towards the end of the innings
Others: The match was played at the Rajiv Gandhi Stadium in Hyderabad on October 10, 2023
